title: Justinas Leveika Wins 2024 Tour Divide, Sets New Official Record
content:
The Lithuanian completed the 2,745-mile bikepacking race in 13 days, 2 hours, and 16 minutes, shaving 20 hours off the previous course record.

Read the full article at Justinas Leveika Wins 2024 Tour Divide, Sets New Official Record on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
